Supply Chain Dashboards:
Developing Metrics to Drive Operational Performance
Don Kline, Corporate Supply Chain Leader, Alkermes, Inc.
Scott Chizzo, President & CEO, Maxiom Group
Thursday, December 2, 2010
5:30 to 8:00pm
Alkermes, Inc.
852 Winter Street, Waltham, MA 02451

To Register*

Agenda
5:30-6:00pm - Cocktails, Hors d'oeuvres and Networking
6:00-6:15pm - Welcome and Introductions
6:15-7:00pm - Presentation with Guest Speaker
7:00-7:30pm - Group Discussion
7:30-8:00pm - Networking

Supply chain professionals are under increasing pressure to demonstrate the efficiency and effectiveness of their performance through quantifiable metrics. This working group session will discuss how use of these metrics are an important tool for both monitoring performance and driving operational improvements. We will explore relevant case studies of supply chain metrics/dashboards and introduce a framework for constructing them. Key considerations will include:

Defining appropriate metrics-what's most relevant and why
Building the dashboard-making it usable, efficient and user friendly
Leveraging existing systems and data
Making the dashboard sustainable and actionable

* This meeting is open only to employees of biotechnology, pharmaceutical and medical device companies.
item.name: Supply Chain Dashboards: Developing Metrics to Drive Operational Performance
